content: Each project is imported as a room, which will contain all the documents and users of this project. The project manager will become the owner of the room

comment.text: Each project is imported as a room, containing all project documents and users. The project manager becomes the room's owner. This text describes the data import process in the portal settings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Each project is imported as a room" is not perfectly translated. 'Hər bir layihə' translates to 'Each project,' but the rest of the sentence doesn't fully capture the concept of importing as a 'room' in the system.  A more literal translation of 'room' might be needed, or an explanation of the system metaphor.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hər bir layihə, layihənin bütün sənəd və istifadəçilərini ehtiva edən bir otaq kimi idxal olunur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence "Hər bir layihə həmin layihənin bütün sənəd və istifadəçilərini ehtiva edən otaq kimi idxal olunur." could be slightly improved for flow.  The repetition of 'layihə' (project) is a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hər bir layihə, layihənin daxilindəki bütün sənəd və istifadəçilərini ehtiva edən bir otaq kimi idxal olunur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English word 'imported' is translated as 'входира' (vhodira) which isn't the most accurate translation. 'Внася' (vnesya) or 'зарежда' (zarezhda) would be more suitable for 'imported' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'входира' with 'внася' or 'зарежда'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'project manager' is translated as 'chef du projet'. While understandable, 'responsable de projet' or 'gestionnaire de projet' are more common and professional terms for 'project manager' in French.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'responsable de projet' or 'gestionnaire de projet' instead of 'chef du projet'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "project manager" is translated as "Ծրագրի ղեկավարը". While technically correct, a more natural translation in this context might be something like "դեպարտամենտի ղեկավարը" or "ծրագրի պատասխանատուն" to better convey the role within the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "դեպարտամենտի ղեկավարը" or "ծրագրի պատասխանատուն" for a more natural-sounding translation of 'project manager'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Each project is imported as a room" is translated as "각 프로젝트가 이 프로젝트의 모든 문서 및 사용자를 포함하는 방으로 가져오기되었습니다." This is overly literal and awkward. A more natural translation would convey the sense of import as a 'creation of a room' or 'establishment of a room'. The current translation also implies the projects were imported *in the past*. It should indicate the continuous state.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 각 프로젝트는 이 프로젝트의 모든 문서 및 사용자를 포함하는 방으로 생성됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "각 프로젝트가 이 프로젝트의 모든 문서 및 사용자를 포함하는 방으로 가져오기되었습니다" is grammatically a bit stiff. The passive voice (곰은소줄쇐줄소줄) makes it sound unnatural. The usage of "방으로" can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 각 프로젝트는 이 프로젝트의 모든 문서와 사용자를 포함하는 방으로 만들어집니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'project manager' translates somewhat literally as '프로젝트 관리자'. While accurate, it could be slightly more contextually appropriate depending on the system. Consider whether a more concise term is better suited.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider retaining '프로젝트 담당자' if that term is commonly used in the target audience's context for 'project manager'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'project manager' is translated literally as 'Manager de proiect'. While understandable, a more natural Romanian phrasing would be 'administrator de proiect' or 'șeful de proiect'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: administrator de proiect sau șeful de proiect

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'owner' as 'proprietarul' is technically correct but can sound a bit formal. Considering the context of a project management system, 'administratorul' might be a more fitting choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: administratorul

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "помещение" (pomeshenie) for "room" is less common and has a more formal connotation than a more standard translation. While not technically incorrect, it feels slightly awkward in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more neutral term for 'room', such as 'пространство' (prostranstvo) or keeping 'комната' (komnata).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Each project is imported as a room" is not accurately conveyed. 'ආයාත වන' implies importing, but the nuance of how a project becomes a 'room' is lost. A more accurate translation might focus on the creation or establishment of a room representing the project.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප Setiap project is created as a room, which will contain all the documents and users of this project.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' (parishreelayakayin) is not the standard translation for 'users'. A more common and natural term would be 'භාවිතකරුවන්' (bhavitakaruwan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: භාවිතකරුවන්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ව්‍යාපෘතියේ කළමනාකරු කාමරයේ හිමිකරු බවට පත්වනු ඇත' is grammatically correct but slightly awkward and less direct. It can be improved for a smoother read.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ව්‍යාපෘතියේ කළමනාකරු කාමරයේ හිමිකරුවා වනු ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'project manager' is accurately translated as 'Менаџер пројекта'. However, a more natural and commonly used term in Serbian would be 'начелник пројекта' or 'руководилац пројекта'. 'Менаџер пројекта' is understandable but feels like a direct transliteration and less idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: начелник пројекта or руководилац пројекта

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'project manager' is translated as 'Menadžer projekta'. While technically correct, 'Projektni menadžer' would be a more common and natural phrasing in Serbian for 'project manager'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Projektni menadžer

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Each project is imported as a room" is not accurately translated. The Turkish translation, "Her proje, bu projenin tüm belgelerini ve kullanıcılarını içerecek bir oda olarak içe aktarılır", is overly literal and slightly awkward.  A more natural Turkish rendering would emphasize the project *being* a room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Her proje bir oda olarak içe aktarılır ve bu odada projenin tüm belgeleri ve kullanıcıları bulunur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Her proje, bu projenin tüm belgelerini ve kullanıcılarını içerecek bir oda olarak içe aktarılır" uses the future tense unnecessarily. The phrase 'içerecek' (will contain) sounds formal and not as natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Her proje bir oda olarak içe aktarılır ve bu odada projenin tüm belgeleri ve kullanıcıları bulunur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "project manager" is directly translated as "менеджер проєкту". While correct, a more natural Ukrainian phrasing would be "керівник проєкту".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: керівник проєкту

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'The project manager will become the owner of the room' is slightly awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be 'Người quản lý dự án sẽ là chủ phòng'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Người quản lý dự án sẽ là chủ phòng
